title: Ticket #547: Hawkeye script to advertise Windows free memory
description: It would be nice if Hawkeye advertised current windows free memory.
remarks:
2013-Jan-23 09:46:52 by johnkn:
information from the windows performance registry can already be advertised. see the STARTD_PUBLISH_WINREG configuration knob. 

STARTD_PUBLISH_WINREG = HKPD\Memory\Available MBytes; \
     BytesAvail = HKPD\Memory\Available Bytes; \
     HKPD\Terminal Services\Total Sessions; \
     HKPD\Processor\% Idle Time; \
     HKPD\System\Processes

This produces the following attributes in the machine ad. 

  WINREG_Memory_Available_MBytes = 5331
  WINREG_BytesAvail = 5590536192.000000
  WINREG_Terminal_Services_Total_Sessions = 2
  WINREG_Processor_Percent_Idle_Time = 72.350384
  WINREG_System_Processes = 166
